    • main

      Parameters:

    • readShapes

      public static Shape[] readShapes​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      read the file and get the the size of array, create objects of shape class, and return array of objects
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of file
      Returns:
      array of objects
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - throw if the file doesn't exist

    • getComparator

      public static java.util.Comparator<Shape> getComparator​(char typeInput)
      call the correct type of comparison based on type input character where h: height, v: volume, a: base area
      Parameters:
      typeInput - the type that determine the comparison
      Returns:
      object of Comparator interface

    • sortShapes

      public static void sortShapes​(Shape[] shapes, char sortInput, java.util.Comparator<Shape> com)
      call the correct sorting based on sort input character where b: bubble sort, i insertion sort, s: selection sort, m: merge sort, q: quick sort, z: heap sort
      Parameters:
      shapes - array of Shape objects
      sortInput - the sort type that is accepted as args
      com - type of comparison

    • displayOutput

      public static void displayOutput​(Shape[] shapes, long start, long end)
      prints the first sorted value and last sorted value, and every thousandth value in between.
      Parameters:
      shapes - array of objects of Shape class
      start - the time when the program start sorting
      end - the time when the program end sorting
